title: Sportscast - October 25, 2015
text:

Updated: Sun, Oct 25 2015, 10:54 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 25, 2015. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Economists see modest Q4 growth, fewer firms giving raises 
NEW YORK (AP) -- A new survey finds a decline in the number of economists who are bullish on growth for the rest of the year. 
IN THE NEWS: ESPN PULLING CLIPS FROM YOUTUBE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- ESPN says it won't play ball with YouTube.
